main.text:
fileview help
use mouse wheel to scroll
click on a list item to start a related utility/change directory.
click the filetype icons on the right to set the filter. The filetype icon with the active light shows the current state of the filter.
The View and Run icons on the far right control whether to run troms and stregs, or view them.
click on the icon labeled "quit" to quit. F8: save screenshot in "CAP" directory.
